item.title: Jenna Ortega will officially play the daughter of Lydia, the character played by Winona Ryder in the original movie, in ‘BEETLEJUICE 2.’
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title: ‘BEETLEJUICE 2’ starring Michael Keaton and Jenna Ortega will debut in theaters on September 6, 2024.

item.title:
Adèle Haenel has announced her retirement from films, citing the complacency and indifference of the French industry to the #MeToo movement as her reason.
